presentationColumns.name: Selection Rate
presentationColumns.description: Ratio of Hired Applicants to Number of Applicants

presentationColumns.name: Is Majority
presentationColumns.description: 1 if Highest Selection Rate (or tie) Among for Group within Legislative Job Category, Else 0

presentationColumns.name: Included in Analysis
presentationColumns.description: Included if Applicants >2% of Legislative Job Category, Else Excluded
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Hiring Details (Ethnicity).Included in Analysis

presentationColumns.name: Chi Square Statistic
presentationColumns.description: Chi-Square Statistic for Comparing Present Group with the Group with the Highest Selection Rate (IS_MAJORITY=1)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Hiring Details (Ethnicity).Chi Square Statistic

presentationColumns.name: Chi Square P-value
presentationColumns.description: Chi-Square Probability Value for Comparing Present Group with the Group with the Highest Selection Rate (IS_MAJORITY=1)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Hiring Details (Ethnicity).Chi Square P-value

presentationColumns.name: Fishers Exact Odds Ratio
presentationColumns.description: Odds Ratio of Observing Selections in Present Group  with the Group with the Highest Selection Rate (IS_MAJORITY=1)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Hiring Details (Ethnicity).Fishers Exact Odds Ratio

presentationColumns.name: Fishers Exact p-value
presentationColumns.description: Fisher's Exact Probability of Observing Selections in Present Group  with the Group with the Highest Selection Rate (IS_MAJORITY=1)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Hiring Details (Ethnicity).Fishers Exact p-value

presentationColumns.name: Impact Ratio
presentationColumns.description: Ratio of Selection Rate of Present Group to the Group with the Highest Selection Rate (IS_MAJORITY=1)

presentationColumns.name: Impact Ratio Adjusted
presentationColumns.description: Ratio of Selection Rate of Present Group to the Group with the Highest Selection Rate (IS_MAJORITY=1) with one greater selection in Present Group and one lesser selection in the Group with the Highest Selection Rate (IS_MAJORITY=1)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Hiring Details (Ethnicity).Impact Ratio Adjusted

presentationColumns.name: z-test of Impact Ratios
presentationColumns.description: Standard Error of Ratio of Selection Rates of Present Group to the Group with the Highest Selection Rate (IS_MAJORITY=1)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Hiring Details (Ethnicity).z-test of Impact Ratios

presentationColumns.name: z-test of Difference in Selection Rates
presentationColumns.description: Standard Error of Difference in Selection Rate of Present Group to the Group with the Highest Selection Rate (IS_MAJORITY=1)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Hiring Details (Ethnicity).z-test of Difference in Selection Rates

localization.localizationKey: z-test of Difference in Selection Rates

presentationColumns.name: Expected Not Hired
presentationColumns.description: Expected Number of Applicants Not Hired
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Hiring Details (Ethnicity).Expected Not Hired

presentationColumns.name: Combined Diversity Score
presentationColumns.description: Diversity score representative of difference in selection rates between the present group and the group with the highest selection rate (IS_MAJORITY=1). Higher the difference, the greater the score.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Hiring Details (Ethnicity).Combined Diversity Score

presentationColumns.name: Combined Diversity Score Weighted by Population
presentationColumns.description: Diversity score representative of difference in selection rates between the present group and the group with the highest selection rate (IS_MAJORITY=1), weighted by population. Higher the difference, the greater the score.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Hiring Details (Ethnicity).Combined Diversity Score Weighted by Population

localization.localizationKey: Combined Diversity Score Weighted by Population

presentationColumns.name: Relative Rank by Diversity Score
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Hiring Details (Ethnicity).Relative Rank by Diversity Score
